Oxford Dictionary recognises Fred Elwell in it's National Biography

Apr 28, 2016—The significant stature of Frederick W Elwell in English art history has come to the fore in a scintillating and absorbing entry in the Oxford Dictionary of National Biography online.

A public library ticket number works as a log in. The book Fred Elwell RA — A Life in Art is now becoming a treasured collector’s piece. Get started now.
